messages.subject: Home link fixed
messages.msgSnippet: The Home link on the navigation bar on the two pages should now open the front page back into a full screen mode.  I knew I had bumped into something about
messages.messageBody:
The Home link on the navigation bar on the two pages should now open the front page back into a full screen mode. I knew I had bumped into something about that earlier.

phil


---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Friends. Fun. Try the all-new Yahoo! Messenger
